name: Steps in the Dark (r083r70)
description:
The player is a big company employee, after an overtime is the last one to exit the building, but after reaching the car it realizes he forgot the keys, so he needs to come back to the office. A near lightning caused a blackout, and the whole building is in the dark. That’s not a problem, since there shouldn’t be anyone inside…

How to play

Move with WASD, point with mouse and SPACE to continue in the dialogs.
